text:
@NYGovCuomo Hey Andy, was it just a coincidence that you gave nursing home execs clemency for COVID-19 after getting large donations from them?  You know that can be considered a #QuidProQuo #PayToPlay #Bribery 

Where is the NY AG? Why aren’t they looking into this?
